topic: Large Language Models Overview

  entities:
    Gemma-2-27B|Model
    Llama-3.1-70B|Model
    Llama-3.1-8B|Model
    Mixtral-8x22B|Model
    Mixtral-8x7B|Model
    GLM-4-Plus|Model
    Qwen2.5-72B|Model
    DeepSeek-V2.5|Model
    Yi-Lightning|Model
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|Model
    Google|Organization
    Meta AI|Organization
    Mistral AI|Organization
    Zhipu AI|Organization
    Alibaba's DAMO Academy|Organization
    DeepSeek AI|Organization
    01.AI|Organization

  proposition: A model with 1 million token context window enables handling extensive documents effectively.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Model|CONTEXT_WINDOW|1 million tokens
    Model|CAPABILITY|handling extensive documents

  proposition: Gemma-2-27B is an open-source Large Language Model developed by Google.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemma-2-27B|DEVELOPED_BY|Google
    Gemma-2-27B|TYPE|open-source Large Language Model

  proposition: Gemma-2-27B features 27 billion parameters.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemma-2-27B|PARAMETERS|27 billion

  proposition: Gemma-2-27B has a context length of 8,192 tokens.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemma-2-27B|CONTEXT_LENGTH|8,192 tokens

  proposition: Gemma-2-27B uses Rotary Position Embedding for enhanced performance.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemma-2-27B|EMBEDDING_TYPE|Rotary Position Embedding

  proposition: Gemma-2-27B allows deployment in environments with limited resources.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemma-2-27B|DEPLOYMENT_CAPABILITY|limited resource environments

topic: Multilingual Large Language Models

  entities:
    Llama-3.1-70B|Model
    Llama-3.1-8B|Model
    Qwen2.5-72B|Model

  proposition: Llama-3.1-70B is a multilingual Large Language Model developed by Meta AI.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.1-70B|DEVELOPED_BY|Meta AI
    Llama-3.1-70B|TYPE|multilingual Large Language Model

  proposition: Llama-3.1-70B supports eight languages: English, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Hindi, Spanish, and Thai.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.1-70B|SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES|English
    Llama-3.1-70B|SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES|German
    Llama-3.1-70B|SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES|French
    Llama-3.1-70B|SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES|Italian
    Llama-3.1-70B|SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES|Portuguese
    Llama-3.1-70B|SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES|Hindi
    Llama-3.1-70B|SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES|Spanish
    Llama-3.1-70B|SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES|Thai

  proposition: Llama-3.1-70B has a context length of 128,000 tokens.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama-3.1-70B|CONTEXT_LENGTH|128,000 tokens

topic: Multimodal Large Language Models

  entities:
    GLM-4V-Plus|Model
    Qwen2-VL-72B|Model
    Llama-3.2-90B-V|Model
    Llama-3.2-11B-V|Model
    DALL-E 3|Model
    Stable Diffusion-3.5 Large|Model

  proposition: GLM-4V-Plus is a multimodal Large Language Model developed by Zhipu AI.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GLM-4V-Plus|DEVELOPED_BY|Zhipu AI
    GLM-4V-Plus|TYPE|multimodal Large Language Model

  proposition: GLM-4V-Plus excels in high-resolution image analysis.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GLM-4V-Plus|CAPABILITY|high-resolution image analysis

  proposition: GLM-4V-Plus has an 8K context window.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GLM-4V-Plus|CONTEXT_WINDOW|8K

  proposition: DALL-E 3 is a text-to-image generation model developed by OpenAI.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    DALL-E 3|DEVELOPED_BY|OpenAI
    DALL-E 3|TYPE|text-to-image generation model

  proposition: Stable Diffusion-3.5 Large features 8.1 billion parameters.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Stable Diffusion-3.5 Large|PARAMETERS|8.1 billion

  proposition: Stable Diffusion-3.5 Large supports 1-megapixel resolution.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Stable Diffusion-3.5 Large|RESOLUTION|1-megapixel
